solution_line_template: Lauren sent {mail_monday} + {more_on_tuesday} = <<{mail_monday}+{more_on_tuesday}={mail_tuesday}>>{mail_tuesday} pieces of mail on Tuesday.
He sent {mail_tuesday} - {fewer_on_wednesday} = <<{mail_tuesday}-{fewer_on_wednesday}={mail_wednesday}>>{mail_wednesday} pieces of mail on Wednesday.
And sent {mail_wednesday} + {more_on_thursday} = <<{mail_wednesday}+{more_on_thursday}={mail_thursday}>>{mail_thursday} pieces of mail on Thursday.
Therefore, he sent {mail_monday} + {mail_tuesday} + {mail_wednesday} + {mail_thursday} = <<{mail_monday}+{mail_tuesday}+{mail_wednesday}+{mail_thursday}={total_mail}>>{total_mail} pieces of mail.
